entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Snow level 1400 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 1100 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
